attributes.action: allocate a proportion of the London Olympic Village, following the 2012 games, for the cost effective accomodation of MPs whose constituency lies greater than 50 miles from Parliment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The London Olympic Village has recently been bailed out by public funds due to a lack of private investment. Following the 2012 games it would seem sensible to use a proportion of this accomodation for MPs whose constituency lies outside what could be considered reasonable commuting distance (50 miles). This would effectively mitigate the requirement for second homes and associated "mistakes" with regard to filing of expenses claims.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
